long_description: Through detailed trail descriptions and gorgeous full-color images, you'll find the state's 50 best day hikes for wildflower viewing. Author: Charles Gurche. Softcover; 269 pages; full-color photographs and maps. Westcliffe Publishers; copyright 2004. Spokane-based author and award-winning photographer Charles Gurche reveals his places to witness the state's unparalleled floral shows. Hikes of all fitness levels can experience Washington's diverse backcountry at its finest. Driving directions deliver hikers to each trailhead, and color maps illustrate the trail routes. Includes 123 full-color photographs of Washington's flower-filled landscapes and blooming plants. 51 handy maps. 50 in-depth profiles of wildflower species found in Washington. Hikes are organized by difficulty level and bloom season.
short_description: Through detailed trail descriptions and gorgeous full-color images, you'll find the state's 50 best day hikes for wildflower viewing.
